abstract: In an acknowledgment of the passionate interest that Indian students have in American colleges, India Ink introduces a regular feature in collaboration with The Choice, The New York Times's college admissions blog. First up: an interview with an Ivy League dean.

byline.original: By JACQUES STEINBERG and HEATHER TIMMONS

lead_paragraph: In spring 2009, The New York Times started a blog called The Choice to demystify the process of applying to American colleges and universities, and paying for it. The blog has since offered countless tips and reams of news on all aspects of the American college admissions process to an audience of students and their families, as well as to their counselors and to college admissions officers themselves.

headline.main: 10 Questions for the Dean of Admissions of the University of Pennsylvania
